subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Armament, Defense and Military Forces
lead_paragraph: Tom Pecora, the men’s basketball coach at Hofstra University, was one of eight coaches who enlisted in Operation Hardwood, helping to lift the morale of soldiers.
snippet: Tom Pecora, the men’s basketball coach at Hofstra University, was one of eight coaches who enlisted in Operation Hardwood, helping to lift the morale of soldiers.
